subject: Soccer
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The outsize ambitions of Jim Pallotta’s group for A.S. Roma include a 52,500-seat stadium, but the challenges facing it in Italy are huge as well.
snippet: The outsize ambitions of Jim Pallotta’s group for A.S. Roma include a 52,500-seat stadium, but the challenges facing it in Italy are huge as well.
